alert.note: Alert for Butler; Darke; Montgomery; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 12:14PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF FRANKLIN AND NORTHEASTERN RIPLEY COUNTIES IN SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA...WAYNE AND UNION COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA...NORTHERN DEARBORN COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA...FAYETTE COUNTY IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA...PREBLE COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO...NORTHWESTERN BUTLER COUNTY IN SOUTHWESTERN OHIO...SOUTHWESTERN DARKE AND WESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 100 PM EST... At 1213 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from near New Madison to near Greensburg, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid reductions in visibility may cause travel difficulties. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Richmond, Trotwood, Oxford, Connersville, Englewood, Eaton, Batesville, Moraine, Centerville, Cambridge City, Bright, Liberty, Camden, Milan, Lewisburg, New Paris, West Alexandria, New Madison, and Gratis. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 136 and 156. I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 25. I-74 in Indiana between mile markers 145 and 169. Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
